message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000. After careful consideration and negotiation, I am pleased to offer you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,400,000. This is a generous offer considering the product's worth and the benefits it promises. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between its value and your budget. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction. Kind regards, Alice.
